name: Cumin-Scented Summer Squash Salad
description: In the summer, squash of all kinds is in abundance. This recipe uses zucchini, or any other summer variety you have on hand or pick up at the farmers’ market. The squash in this North African salad is lightly steamed.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound zucchini or other summer squash, thinly sliced or cut in 1/2-inch dice
3/4 to 1 teaspoon cumin seeds, lightly toasted and ground

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the squash for three to five minutes until just tender. Remove from the heat.

Mix together the lemon juice, garlic, cumin, salt, pepper and olive oil. Toss with the squash. You can serve this warm, in which case add the cilantro and serve. Alternately, refrigerate until shortly before serving. Toss with the cilantro and serve.
